channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Probiotic Strains That Work Best as You Age
item.description: Stress, illness, and antibiotics can disrupt gut balance. The right probiotics may help support digestion, immunity, and overall gut health.

item.title: Can Coffee Affect Your Mood? Here's What to Know
Ways to Encourage Healthy Eating in Kids
10 Well-Being Essentials To Revamp Your Routine For Fall
item.description: From protein bars to serums—we’ve got you covered.

item.title: I Thought My Back Pain Was Normal — It Turned Out To Be A Serious Disease
item.description: What started with numbness below the waist evolved into chronic back pain.

item.title: Major Myths That Are Getting In The Way of Your Financial Well-Being
item.description: Just like subscribing to health myths can get in the way of your wellness goals, believing in investing misconceptions can impact your finance goals.

item.title: I'm A Mom & Psychotherapist — How I Keep Calm When I Want To Explode
item.description: There are so many moments as caregivers when you need a release valve—but can't. Here's how a psychotherapist deals with it.

item.title: 3 Steps You Definitely Shouldn’t Ignore For Plump, Jello Skin
item.description: How do you care for skin so bouncy it resembles Jello? So glad you asked.
